description: Fix the license entry on Gnome Software
summary: Wrong licencense. It is not propietary, it is GPL

description: Based on reviews I chose Denemo musical score editor (a frontend to the Lilypond PDF writer) as it should generate the best quality scores. This indeed seems to be quite true. Yet it is rather difficult to use as the GUI is very comprehensive but rather unfriendly. Help is available but much detailed info is lacking. Quite often desired results can only be found and obtained by trial an error and the ways to input desired complex musical symbols does not always seem logical. Many shortcuts can be programmed, but one has to learn to use the system. An advantage is that one can skip learning the Lilypond programming language largely. So this package is only worthwhile if one puts much effort in learning to use it and if one uses it for many compositions for quite a long time.
summary: A standard musical score editor, a must-have for the composer

description: This package is extremely old and outdated -- please update in the repository!
Ich habe dieses Programm instaliert und es funktionierte nicht und es lässt sich nicht deinstalieren
Difícil manejo, muy poco intuitivo, pésima traducción al español y los putos globos explicativos aparecen continuamente. Incomodísimo.
